name: Fail Fail Succeed
description:
A solo weekend project, turned into a product of self reflection.

What is it?Fail Fail Succeed is 2D puzzle platformer, inspired by me experiences with coping, stress and mental health. Step into the role of an anonymous individual, who just wants to make it back to their dog. At your disposal are orbs that modify your abilities and change what you leave behind when you die, and be rewarded with some much needed puppy love.Continued development

This game was originally made over a weekend, as a fun little challenge. Realizing how much I got out of it, both in the form of reflection and experience, I've decided to continue the development in my spare time.

The page will continously be updated with new builds as they come - try them out!

I've also decided to submit this to Gotland Game Conference 2022 - wish me good luck!

Tools
  • LDtk
  • LDtk to Unity Importer
  • Unity
  • Procreate
Notes

The game is currently in an alfa state - there are issues and there are things missing. I will update the build, but keep the original one as a reference point for how far I've gotten in the end.

Also can't spell for the life of me - thank you for your understanding!
